tool_description: this API provides copyright free images
name: free images API
title: free images API

api_list.name: copyright free images API
api_list.description: in this API we  gathered best sources of free to use images, and we keep adding more sources.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://free-images-api.p.rapidapi.com/images/wallpaper"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "free-images-api.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://free-images-api.p.rapidapi.com/images/{search}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "free-images-api.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
